cast.original_title: The Best Years of Our Lives
cast.overview: It's the hope that sustains the spirit of every GI: the dream of the day when he will finally return home. For three WWII veterans, the day has arrived. But for each man, the dream is about to become a nightmare.
cast.title: The Best Years of Our Lives
cast.character: Boy at Soda Fountain - Mollett Scene (uncredited)

cast.overview: In the Salinas Valley in and around World War I, Cal Trask feels he must compete against overwhelming odds with his brother for the love of their father. Cal is frustrated at every turn, from his reaction to the war, how to get ahead in business and in life, and how to relate to his estranged mother.
cast.title: East of Eden

details.biography: Mickey Roth was born on 6 March 1932 in Spokane, Washington, USA. He is an actor, known for Rhapsody in Blue, Magic Town and The Ray Milland Show. He has been married to Janice Ellen Arola since 17 October 1975. They have one child.
details.name: Mickey Roth
